name: MTLStructMember
desc: An object that provides information about a field in a struct.

items.name: var name: String
items.desc: The name of the struct member.

items.name: var dataType: MTLDataType
items.desc: The data type of the struct member.

items.name: var offset: Int
items.desc: The location of this member relative to the start of its struct, in bytes.

items.name: var argumentIndex: Int
items.desc: The index in the argument table that corresponds to the struct member.

items.name: func arrayType() -> MTLArrayType?
items.desc: Provides a description of the underlying array when the struct member holds an array.

items.name: func structType() -> MTLStructType?
items.desc: Provides a description of the underlying struct when the struct member holds a struct.

items.name: func pointerType() -> MTLPointerType?
items.desc: Provides a description of the underlying pointer when the struct member holds a pointer.

items.name: func textureReferenceType() -> MTLTextureReferenceType?
items.desc: Provides a description of the underlying texture when the struct member holds a texture.
